name: intro2se-20clc04-group01
description: Folder in this repo - /src: used to store source code - /docs: used to store documentations, which has the following folders   - management: storing planning documents, reports (weekly report,   project status report, etc.)   - requirements: storing all requirements, including vision document and   use cases   - analysis and design: storing all analysis and design related documents,   including software architecture document, UML models, UI design   - test: storing all test documents such as test plan, test cases, test reports - /pa: including subfolders to store submissions. Each subfolder contains one PA submission.
